title: Subscriber Updates Payment Method
description: A subscriber's credit card has expired, and they need to update their payment information to keep their streaming service active.

tasks.description: Identify the subscriber and confirm their subscription is at risk due to a failed payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the subscriber and the payment failure.

tasks.description: Securely collect the new credit card information from the subscriber.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses a secure form to capture the new payment details.

tasks.description: Update the payment method on the subscriber's account and re-run the failed charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the payment info and processes the payment.
